short_summary: Janitorial Services, exterior cleaning, and snow removal for Public Works and Government Services Canada
description: Janitorial Services including labour, material and equipment for Public Works and Government Services Canada. Floor number 1,2 and 3 and exterior cleaning with snow removal includes floor 1,2, and 3 .
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement 
# Closes: June 19, 2024 at 14:00 EST

## Solicitation Information
* Title: Janitorial Services for Parliament Hill and Blocks 2 and 3
* Solicitation Number: WS-4552274112
* Amendment Number: 3
* Publication Date: April 30, 2024
* Tender Status: Expired
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Category: SRV (Services)
* Trade Agreements: Various international agreements (see below)

## Business Requirements
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bidders to submit proposals for janitorial services for its various buildings located on Parliament Hill and Blocks 2 and 3. The services include:
* Labour
* Materials
* Equipment
* Exterior cleaning, including snow removal for Blocks 1, 2, and 3
* Arrangements have been made for a mandatory site visit, which is scheduled for May 22, 2024, at 10:00 EST.

## Submission Information
* Bid Submission Deadline: June 19, 2024 at 14:00 EST
* All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received by the deadline; late submissions will be considered non-responsive.
* Bidders must confirm attendance for the mandatory site visit with the Contracting Authority no later than May 16, 2024, at 14:00 EST.

## Notice and Attachments
* The tender description is available on Ariba Discovery (https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19563712?extsite=MTk1NjM3MTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
* This notice is subject to the terms and conditions of the trade agreements listed below.

## Trade Agreements
The following international agreements apply to this tender:
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Ch
